text:
I hope this is the right channel. I'm trying to build my documentation but keep getting the following error
```ERROR: `NonlinearSchrodinger=b3fbeaf7-5746-403c-a6b7-06939dc82746` depends on `TerminalLoggers`, but no such entry exists in the manifest.```
I already removed that dependency hence why it's not in my manifest, but documenter keeps insisting the project depends on it. Any idea how to fix this? I tried deleting the package's manifest and re-instantiating but it didn't help. Also tried adding TerminalLoggers back as a dependency but it also didn't help. I'm quite stuck.

elements.text: I hope this is the right channel. I'm trying to build my documentation but keep getting the following error
ERROR: `NonlinearSchrodinger=b3fbeaf7-5746-403c-a6b7-06939dc82746` depends on `TerminalLoggers`, but no such entry exists in the manifest.

I already removed that dependency hence why it's not in my manifest, but documenter keeps insisting the project depends on it. Any idea how to fix this? I tried deleting the package's manifest and re-instantiating but it didn't help. Also tried adding TerminalLoggers back as a dependency but it also didn't help. I'm quite stuck.

text: To be specific, the error appears every time I activate the docs environment. That environment is completely broken and I can't add or remove anything in it

elements.text: To be specific, the error appears every time I activate the docs environment. That environment is completely broken and I can't add or remove anything in it

text: I had to edit docs/Manifest.toml by hand unfortunately, I found the dependency there. Now it throws a warning about a missing (different) dependency but otherwise works (and breaks again if I add it by hand in the manifest, I need to fix this somehow)

elements.text: I had to edit docs/Manifest.toml by hand unfortunately, I found the dependency there. Now it throws a warning about a missing (different) dependency but otherwise works (and breaks again if I add it by hand in the manifest, I need to fix this somehow)

text: Activate your `docs` project and do a `pkg> resolve` to make the Manifest update and take the new dependencies into account.

elements.text: to make the Manifest update and take the new dependencies into account.
